column4: ok i'm trying and reading for more than 2hours now... Anyone got a hot tip on how to make a Linksys WMP54G V1 WLan Card work? Tried several Drivers and all said Hardware present at Ndis but the device was not shown in the Network configuration
What point didja get to in the ndiswrapper wiki?
Drop the tail of your /var/log/messages into pastebin
Did you make sure you installed the right drivers?
What piece of hardware are you using?
Well, is it USB or PCI?
type in "lspci" and give me the ID real quick
You should be using something like bcmwl5.inf and bcmwl5.sys or something for your drivers
does it say bcmlw5  driver present, hardware present?
Wow... I'm totally lost as to whats gettin stuck on. ufo might be able to help though
